SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_LECTURE A JOIN TB_CLASS B ON(A.CLS_ID = B.CLS_ID) WHERE A.LEC_DELETE = 'N' AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
AND UPPER(B.CLS_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{ keyword } || '%')
AND A.LEC_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
AND A.ACC_OPTION LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'
AND A.ACC_STATUS LIKE '%' || #{ keyword } || '%'

SELECT A.LEC_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , B.MEMBER_NAME , C.CLS_ID , C.CLS_NAME , D.REF_NO , D.REF_PAY , D.REF_DATE , D.REF_CONTENT FROM TB_LECTURE A JOIN TB_MEMBER B ON(A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID) JOIN TB_CLASS C ON(A.CLS_ID = C.CLS_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_REFUND D ON(A.LEC_NO = D.LEC_NO) WHERE A.LEC_NO = #{ no } AND LEC_DELETE = 'N'
